resources.string: Plug in reminder. Click to cancel.
Caution, your alarm volume is muted!

If your device is not plugged in, not in use, and not moving at bedtime, this app will remind you to plug in before you fall asleep and wake to a low or dead battery.\n\nIt works best if you schedule the alarm for your normal bedtime. If you want to schedule an alarm that repeats for more than one day, set different bedtimes, or customize other actions, then you should upgrade to the professional version in the app.
Skip alarm if battery level is
Adding additional alarms requires an upgrade to the professional version.
Changing the repeat option requires an upgrade to the professional version.
Changing advanced settings requires an upgrade to the professional version.

More updates are coming soon. Please keep sending me your suggestions!
 
 v2.3
 - Updated the UI - cleaner and more simple especially for Android 3.0+
 v2.2.1
 - Added a long-click context menu to alarm list
 - Fixed a crash bug when hitting a key during alarm
 v2.2
 - Added an option in Pro version to cancel alarm if your battery is above a set level.
 - Minor bug fixes. 
 v2.1
 - Fixed sound on some devices including Android 4.1
 - Changed to alarm volume instead of ringer volume
 
 v2.0
 - Added ability to upgrade to Pro to get new features:
 * Advanced settings
 * Multiple alarms
 * Repeat schedule by day
 - All translations have been removed until I get a change to update
 
 v1.1.3
 - Fixed bug that caused the alarm to go off 5 minutes early
 - Fixed bug where vibrate would not always work when selected
 - Fixed a bug with auto-snooze motion detection on some devices (including Galaxy Nexus)
 - Updated notification messages to indicate why alarm was automatically snoozed.
 - Added this change log
 - Updated the Spanish translation using Google Translate Toolkit. Please let me know if the translation is poor.
 
 v1.1.2
 - Fixed a bug where some phones would list Unknown for Alarm Tone instead of just using the default
 - Updated feedback email in menu
 - Removed German due to poor translation
 v1.1.1
 - Fixed compatibility with Galaxy Nexus.
 - Updated developer name to Dr Poindexter
